abstract: A projection of the state object that creates bindings to its properties.
overview:
## Discussion

Use the projected value to get a [doc://com.apple.SwiftUI/documentation/SwiftUI/Binding] to a property of a state object. To access the projected value, prefix the property name with a dollar sign (`$`). For example, you can get a binding to a model’s `isEnabled` Boolean so that a [doc://com.apple.SwiftUI/documentation/SwiftUI/Toggle] can control the value:

items.description: The underlying value referenced by the state object.
items.name: wrappedValue

title: projectedValue
